page.title: 10THE QUEENS VISIT TO CALOW
page.content: by Claire Peters On March 15th 1985 the Queen of England was to come to Calow,to open the new hospital.It was a very exciting week.Everyone was getting prepared for the Special Occasion. Policemen and women came and searched the area on foot,with dogs and with binoculars from the rooftop.Finally the great day came.People started going into the grounds early.The weather wasnot too good,but they werent going to miss the special event.It was a long time until she came,but at 3.35pm the Queen finally arrived. She was wearing a pink hat and a pink suit. After she had officially opened the hospital,she went along Top Road, down Church Lane, along Blacksmith Lane, all in Calow,and off to her next visit.
